Flow.description: JRS - overhaul of questions being asked for this form
Flow.label: (Permit Flow) Driveway Permit

loops.name: Loop_Through_and_Assign_New_Driveway
loops.label: Loop Through and Assign New Driveway

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Header_Display
fields.fieldText: New {!Record_Type_Name} Application

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Display
fields.fieldText:
Project Details

Provide us with additional details about the project by filling in the details below.

fields.name: Are_you_submitting_the_application_under_the_ordinances_and_policies_in_effect_a
fields.fieldText: Are you submitting the application under the ordinances and policies in effect at the time the application is accepted for review by the Town of Clayton?

fields.name: Please_specify_the_ordinance_s_and_or_policy_ies_including_version_s_under_which
fields.fieldText: Please specify the ordinance(s) and/or policy(ies), including version(s), under which the application is being submitted?

fields.name: Ordinance_Policy_Effective_Date
fields.fieldText: Ordinance/Policy Effective Date

fields.name: Street_Type
fields.fieldText: Street Type

fields.name: Private_Street
fields.fieldText: Driveway permit is NOT required, please complete a Zoning Compliance Permit instead.

fields.name: Type_of_street
fields.fieldText: Type of street

fields.name: RightofWay
fields.fieldText: Please complete a Zoning Compliance Permit instead

fields.name: Will_this_work_be_within_the_right_of_way
fields.fieldText: Will this work be within the right-of-way?

fields.name: Is_this_project_associated_with_an_approved_sub_division_site_plan_conditional_z
fields.fieldText: Is this project associated with an approved sub-division, site-plan, conditional zoning, zoning compliance permit, erosion control permit, or similar development approval?

fields.name: Approved_application_number
fields.fieldText: Approved application number

fields.name: Enter_application_number
fields.fieldText: Enter application number

fields.name: Driveway_Information
fields.fieldText: Driveway Information

fields.name: Is_there_an_existing_sidewalk
fields.fieldText: Is there an existing sidewalk?

fields.name: Are_there_any_existing_driveway_s
fields.fieldText: Are there any existing driveway(s)?

fields.name: How_many
fields.fieldText: How many?

fields.name: ExistingDrivewayInfo
fields.fieldText: Existing Driveway Information

fields.name: Curb_Radius
fields.fieldText: Curb Radius

fields.name: Width
fields.fieldText: Width

fields.name: Length
fields.fieldText: Length

fields.name: ExistingDrivewayDisplay
fields.fieldText: IF you have more than 1 existing driveway click the + Add button below.

fields.name: NewDrivewayInfo
fields.fieldText: New Driveway Information

fields.name: What_is_the_proposed_driveway_materials_for_construction
fields.fieldText: What is the proposed driveway materials for construction?
fields.helpText: If you are using pavement, please select Concrete. (Gravel not allowed)

fields.name: How_many_feet_will_the_driveway_be_from_the_property_line
fields.fieldText: How many feet will the driveway be from the property line?
fields.helpText: Minimum of 3 feet away from property line

fields.name: What_is_the_proposed_curb_radius_in_connection_to_the_existing_roadway_surface
fields.fieldText: What is the proposed curb radius in connection to the existing roadway surface?
fields.helpText:
For Res: Min 3.5' Radius

For Non-Res: Min 20' Radius

fields.name: What_is_the_proposed_width_of_the_driveway
fields.fieldText: What is the proposed width of the driveway?
fields.helpText:
Res: 10’-24’

Non-Res: >24’ if 2-way

>20’ if 1-way

fields.name: What_is_the_proposed_length_of_the_driveway
fields.fieldText: What is the proposed length of the driveway?

fields.name: NewDrivewayDisplay
fields.fieldText: To add additional new driveway information click the + Add button below.

fields.name: Drain_Improvement
fields.fieldText: Drain Improvement

fields.name: Are_there_proposed_drainage_improvements
fields.fieldText: Are there proposed drainage improvements?

fields.name: Are_you_proposing_to_modify_or_add_to_an_existing_drainage_pipe_system
fields.fieldText: Are you proposing to modify or add to an existing drainage pipe/system?

fields.name: What_is_the_proposed_diameter_of_the_new_pipe_or_modifications
fields.fieldText: What is the proposed diameter of the new pipe or modifications?

fields.name: Are_you_proposing_to_modify_or_add_curb_and_gutter
fields.fieldText: Are you proposing to modify or add curb and gutter?

fields.name: What_is_the_length_of_proposed_new_or_modified_curb_and_gutter
fields.fieldText: What is the length of proposed new or modified curb and gutter?

fields.name: Driveway_Details
fields.fieldText: Driveway Details

fields.name: Driveway_Permit_Driveway_Width
fields.fieldText: Driveway Width

validationRule.errorMessage: Driveway width must be a minimum of 10 feet and no more than 24 feet.
